content.heroIntro: Welcome to CA SALINA, an exclusive residential development by ASARON STUDIO nestled in the desirable Los Llomios district of Los Alcazares, Murcia. This premium villa community represents the perfect blend of contemporary design, quality construction, and Mediterranean lifestyle. Each villa offers 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms within a spacious 106m² built area on generously sized 235m² plots, starting from just €499,900. Scheduled for completion on 01-03-2027, CA SALINA provides foreign buyers with an exceptional opportunity to invest in one of Spain's most sought-after coastal regions. ASARON STUDIO brings decades of expertise in creating homes that combine modern amenities with authentic Mediterranean charm, making CA SALINA an ideal choice for families, investors, and those seeking a coastal retreat with genuine Spanish character.

locationSection.intro: Los Llomios, located in the heart of Los Alcazares, Murcia, has emerged as one of Spain's most vibrant residential communities. This strategic coastal location offers the perfect balance between peaceful Mediterranean living and convenient access to world-class amenities. Los Alcazares is renowned for its established international community where English is widely spoken, making it exceptionally welcoming for overseas buyers. The area combines authentic Spanish charm with modern infrastructure, excellent healthcare facilities, quality education options, and direct access to some of the Costa Blanca's most pristine beaches. Whether you're seeking a permanent residence, holiday home, or investment property, Los Llomios provides an unbeatable combination of lifestyle, value, and growth potential. The region benefits from consistent year-on-year property appreciation of 8%, significantly outperforming many other Spanish markets while remaining 40% more affordable than island properties.

faqs.question: Can foreigners buy property in Spain?
faqs.answer: Yes, foreigners can purchase property in Spain without restrictions. Non-residents require a Spanish tax identification number (NIE). ASARON STUDIO and local legal professionals assist with all documentation and regulatory requirements, making the process straightforward for international buyers.

faqs.question: What are the costs of buying property in Spain?
faqs.answer: Beyond the property purchase price, buyers should budget for transfer tax (6-10%), notary fees (0.5-1%), registry fees (0.1-0.2%), and legal fees (1-2%). Our team provides detailed cost breakdowns during the consultation process to ensure complete transparency.
